name: androidx.mediarouter.media.MediaTransferReceiver
description:
A BroadcastReceiver class for enabling Media transfer feature. Media transfer is a feature that media routing can be controlled via system UI. By using this, media app users can re-route the media without opening the app activity again. Also, the media can be transferred from one device to another device seamlessly, depending on the devices.
This feature is supported from Android 11.
